data.title: Home
data.text:
The VYKON System Distributor (VSD) channel consists of a group of elite automation and systems integration distributors across North America that provide products for, support, and train the largest channel of system integrators in the world. VSDs provide regional sales and engineering support, immediate inventory, training, and programming services. In addition to the complete line of VYKON Building Automation, Energy, and Security products, VSDs offer complementary control products and services to support the systems integration industry. These include: controllers of various brands and protocols, drives, sensors, and actuators. VSDs provide advanced product and software support and employ highly trained specialist in all facets of systems integration.

VYKON Systems Integrators (VSIs) engineer, program, install, and service VYKON building, energy, and security products and software. More than 500 VYKON Systems Integrators are trained and certified to support the complete VYKON product line. VSIs provide complete end-to-end integrated systems utilizing multiple protocols and multiple brands of equipment, controls, and peripheral devices. VSIs have direct access to Tridium’s VYKON Support Team.

The Tridium VYKON Support Team provides sales and after-sale support for VYKON products. This team of experts can help provide design and application assistance including specification assistance to consultants, specifiers, and end users prior to purchase. The VYKON support team works closely with VSDs and VSIs for technical support during design, install, and service phases of a project.

Open distribution.

The VYKON distribution channel utilizes an Open Distribution Model. VYKON does not assign exclusive territories for VYKON System Integrators. This means that end users are free to buy VYKON products from multiple VSIs in an area.

Open product availability.

All VYKON partners have complete access to the entire VYKON product line. The VYKON brand does not limit product by distributor or integrator. Any partner that completes the training and certification requirements can sell and service the complete VYKON building automation, energy, and security product line.

VYKON products are open.

VYKON hardware and software products are completely open. All Niagara based products have a Niagara Conformance (NIC) profile. This profile defines which brand or brands of tools, JACES, and Supervisory software can connect to a specific product. The VYKON brand NIC states that ANY branded tool, JACE, or Supervisor can connect to a VYKON product. This means that when you buy a VYKON branded system you can have any VYKON partner expand and support the system. You can also have a service provider of another brand of Niagara-based products support the system as well. No special licenses must be added or changed when deploying a VYKON product.

Building possibility with the Niagara Framework®

The pace of innovation has never been more rapid, and now, more than ever, agility is key. By building solutions on Niagara, VYKON enables businesses to create smarter and more efficient enterprises for today that are adaptable for tomorrow.

Our open software platform is fueling growth in Smart Building and Smart City projects. It enables the integration of complex and disparate monitoring, control and automation solutions, making facilities easier to manage and control, driving operational efficiencies, saving energy and reducing costs. With Niagara, your building systems talk to each other across the enterprise. But more importantly, they talk to you.

The framework for tomorrow’s cities

As municipalities grapple with legacy infrastructure, mass urbanization, financial pressures and a growing urban middle class, many are looking to integrate their technology and build strategic approaches to sustainability, economic development and the long-term well-being of their citizens.

By enabling an ecosystem of interconnected commercial/industrial buildings, smart grid, water utility management, transportation applications and government services administration, VYKON can help municipalities operate with greater efficiency, awareness and intelligence.

Niagara enables every system to communicate and interoperate:

Energy (smart grid, alternative energy, demand management)

Water utility (wastewater treatment, system monitoring)

Transportation (fleet, fuel, traffic management, street lighting)

Buildings management (municipal, commercial, industrial)

Government services (public safety, CCTV, digital signage)
